thread.title: Shares of Japan’s Top Mobile Carriers Drop After Prime Minister’s Comments
thread.title_full: Shares of Japan’s Top Mobile Carriers Drop After Prime Minister’s Comments - WSJ

author: Alexander Martin
title: Shares of Japan’s Top Mobile Carriers Drop After Prime Minister’s Comments
text:
TOKYO—Shares in Japan’s leading mobile carriers fell sharply Monday after Prime Minister Shinzo Abe urged the government to consider ways to lower calling rates, underscoring the vulnerability of established telecommunications giants in one of the most expensive wireless markets in the world.
Mr. Abe, who has been trying to get other Japanese businesses to raise prices to beat the country’s stubborn deflation, seems concerned that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
